articles.author: Amala Balakrishner
articles.title: Asia-Pacific markets trade mixed ahead of Trump's deadline for higher tariffs - CNBC
articles.description: U.S. markets are closed on Friday for the Independence Day public holiday.
articles.content:
Good morning from Singapore.
Asia-Pacific markets were set to mostly climb Friday after trading mixed the day before.
Japan's benchmark Nikkei 225 was set to open higher, with the futures contract … [+413 chars]
